title: ANSIS Soil Chemical Property Schema
description: JSON Schema definitions of the complete list of observable soil chemical properties defined in the ANSIS Domain Ontology.
$comment: Derived from Soil Chemical Methods – Australasia. (The 'Green Book'.)

ammoniumAndNitrate.title: Concentration of Ammonium and Nitrate
ammoniumAndNitrate.description: Concentration of Ammonium and Nitrate (NH4 + NO3)

ammoniumAndNitrateAndNitrite.title: Concentration of Ammonium, Nitrate and Nitrite
ammoniumAndNitrateAndNitrite.description: Concentration of Ammonium, Nitrate and Nitrite (NH4 + NO3 + NO2)

ammoniumAndNitrite.title: Concentration of Ammonium and Nitrite
ammoniumAndNitrite.description: Concentration of Ammonium and Nitrite (NH4 + NO2)

calciumToMagnesium.title: Concentration ratio of Calcium to Magnesium
calciumToMagnesium.description: Concentration ratio of Calcium to Magnesium

netPotentiallyMineralisableNitrogen.title: Concentration of net potentially mineralisable Nitrogen
netPotentiallyMineralisableNitrogen.description: Concentration of net potentially mineralisable Nitrogen (N)

nitrateAndNitrite.title: Concentration of Nitrate and Nitrite
nitrateAndNitrite.description: Concentration of Nitrate and Nitrite (NO3 + NO2)

potassiumToMagnesium.title: Concentration ratio of Potassium to Magnesium
potassiumToMagnesium.description: Concentration ratio of Potassium to Magnesium

potassiumToSodium.title: Concentration ratio of Potassium to Sodium
potassiumToSodium.description: Concentration ratio of Potassium to Sodium

totalOrganicCarbonToTotalSoilNitrogen.title: Concentration ratio of total organic Carbon to total soil Nitrogen
totalOrganicCarbonToTotalSoilNitrogen.description: Concentration ratio of total organic Carbon to total soil Nitrogen
